sentences.src_sentence: 그간의 산업화에 힘쓴 덕분에 한국경제가 규모나 수준 면에서 괄목할 만한 향상을 보였으므로 70년대의 방향 수정은 당연했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It was natural to change the direction of the 1970s as the Korean economy showed a remarkable improvement in scale and level thanks to its efforts for industrialization.

sentences.src_sentence: 기업투자를 장려하느라 그동안은 돈을 푸는 위주의 금융 정책을 써 왔지만, 이젠 물가안정을 위해서 돈줄을 조이는 긴축 정책도 간간이 채택했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Previously, to inspire corporate investment, the government made use of financial policies to loosen money, but now it occasionally adopted austerity policies that tighten money lines for price stability.

sentences.src_sentence: 1973년에 터진 석유파동은 박정희 경제로서 처음 겪은 충격이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Park Chung-hee's economy experienced its first shock with oil crisis in 1973.

sentences.src_sentence: 석유 한 방울 안 나는 나라에서 하루아침에 국제 원유값이 배럴당 3달러에서 11달러로 급등했으니 그 충격이 이만저만이 아니었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: For a country without any oil, the international won price increased from $3 per barrel to $11 per barrel overnight, therefore, the shock was not enough.

sentences.src_sentence: 1960년대에는 경제 성장을 위해 앞만 보고 열심히 뛰면 됐는데 이젠 그게 아니었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Previously in the 1960s, all that was needed was a vision and hard work hard for economic growth, but that was no longer the case.

sentences.src_sentence: 불황과 인플레이션이 함께 일어나는 소위 스태그플레이션이라는 것도 겪어야 했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It also needed to go through a combination of recession and inflation, so-called stagflation.

sentences.src_sentence: 경제 구조 자체가 70년대에 접어서는 훨씬 복잡해진 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: In the 1970s the economic structure became even more complex.

sentences.src_sentence: 댐 건설로 부족한 전기 문제를 해결했고, 울산에 공업단지를 조성하고, 포항제철과 경부고속도로를 건설했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The construction of the dam resolved the electricity shortage, established an industrial complex in Ulsan, and built Pohang Steel and Gyeongbu Expressway.

sentences.src_sentence: 이 같은 산업화의 진전이 곧 국민의 정치적 지지를 높여 주는 것은 아니었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Progress like this in industrialization did not result in an immediate increase the political support of the people.

sentences.src_sentence: 민주화 세력들에게 박정희 정권은 여전히 타도의 대상인 독재정권이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The Park Chung-hee regime was still a dictatorship that was subject to overthrow according to democratization forces.

sentences.src_sentence: 산업화의 부작용이 누적되면서 박정희 정권에 대한 서민계층의 불만이나 비판은 점점 커졌다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The dissatisfaction and criticism of the working class against the Park Chung-hee administration grew as the side effects of industrialization accumulated.

sentences.src_sentence: 중화학공업의 무리한 추진에는 정부 내 경제 관료들의 반대도 많았다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Many economic officials in the government resisted the unreasonable promotion of the heavy and chemical industry.

sentences.src_sentence: 1972년 유신 시대에 들어서면서 강권 탄압은 더 심해졌고, 경제개발 성과에 상관없이 민심은 갈수록 흉흉해졌다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The oppression of coercive power intensified in 1972, as the Yushin era entered, and the public sentiment became increasingly atrocious regardless of economic development achievements.

sentences.src_sentence: 아무리 정치적 반대를 봉쇄한다고 해도 그전 같은 일방적인 산업화 정책을 계속 밀어붙이기 어려운 상황이 전개되었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It was difficult to continue pushing forward with the same unilateral industrialization policy as before regardless of the political opposition to block the attempts.

sentences.src_sentence: 경제적 측면뿐 아니라, 정치·사회적 측면에서도 박정희 경제는 기존의 방향을 수정하지 않을 수 없었던 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Park Chung-hee's economy had to change its direction not only economically, but also politically and socially.

sentences.src_sentence: 대표적인 변화는 서민층의 세금을 대폭 깎아 준 1974년의 1.14 긴급조치였다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The 1.14 emergency measure in 1974, was the representative change which drastically cut taxes for the working class.

sentences.src_sentence: 국회가 소득세 면세점을 1만 6,000원에서 1만 8,000원으로 기껏 2,000원 인상했었는데, 박정희는 어느 날 갑자기 대통령 긴급명령을 발동해서 단번에 5만 원으로 올려 버렸다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The National Assembly raised the income tax duty-free shop from 16,000 won to 18,000 won at most by 2,000 won, however, Park Chung-hee suddenly invoked the presidential emergency order and raised it to 50,000 won at once.

sentences.src_sentence: 월 소득 5만 원 이하는 세금을 한 푼도 안 내도록 한 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Individuals earning less than 50,000 won in monthly income were not taxed at all.

sentences.src_sentence: 이즈음 박정희의 주된 관심사는 중화학공업 육성이었으나, 한편으로는 서민 가계 형편이나 노동자 문제 등에 대해서도 여러 가지 정책들을 새롭게 추진했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: At this time, various policies were newly promoted for the poor household situation and worker problems but Park Chung-hee's main concern was fostering the heavy and chemical industry.

sentences.src_sentence: 월급쟁이들의 예금에는 이자소득세를 면제하고 높은 이자를 보장해 주는 ‘재산형성저축’이라는 것도 이때 만들어졌다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: This was when the 'Property Formation Savings', which exempts interest income tax and guarantees high interest on the deposits of salaried workers, was also created.

sentences.src_sentence: 가장 주목해야 할 것은 1977년 7월부터 시작된 의료보험제도다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: In July 1977, the most notable is the medical insurance system that was started.

sentences.src_sentence: 원래 박정희 정부는 의료보험보다 연금제도 도입을 더 적극적으로 검토했었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Initially, the Park Chung-hee administration was more concerned with introducing a pension system than medical insurance.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희는 연금제도에 부정적이었으나 KDI 박사들의 설득에 생각이 바뀌었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: At first, Park Chung-hee was unsure about the pension system, but the persuasion of KDI doctors resulted in a change of heart. .

sentences.src_sentence: 석유파동의 여진이 계속되는 가운데도 한편에서는 KDI와 경제 관료들을 중심으로 복지 정책에 대한 검토는 계속 진행됐다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The continuation of the aftershocks of the oil crisis and the review of welfare policies continued, centered on KDI and economic officials.

sentences.src_sentence: 연기되었던 국민복지연금법 시행이 먼저냐, 의료보험제도 도입이 먼저냐를 놓고 시비가 분분했으나 결국 박정희는 의료보험제도를 선택했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: No agreement could be reached regarding whether the implementation of the National Welfare and Pension Act, which was delayed, or the introduction of the medical insurance system came first, but in the end, Park Chung-hee chose the medical insurance system.

sentences.src_sentence: 이후 의료보험제도는 1976년에 국회에서 법이 통과되고, 이듬해 7월부터 실시하게 되었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The medical insurance system was administered a year later after being approved by the National Assembly in 1976.

sentences.src_sentence: 안정화 정책으로 선회 1978년 선거 패배로 인해 비록 개각이 필요했다고는 하지만, 신현확이라는 인물이 새로운 경제사령탑인 부총리겸 경제기획원 장관에 기용된 것은 매우 중요한 의미를 지니고 있었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Although it was necessary to reshuffle because of the defeat in the 1978 election, Shin Hyun-hwak’s appointment as the new economic leader, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of the Economic Planning Board.

sentences.src_sentence: 성장 중심 경제 정책의 일대 전환을 예고하는 것이었기 때문이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: This was because it heralded a major shift in growth-oriented economic policy.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희로서는 뿌리째 흔들리는 경제의 중심을 새롭게 잡아 나가는 데 적합한 인물로서 고심 끝에 신현확을 선택한 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Park Chung-hee, picked Shin Hyeon-hwak after a lot of consideration as a person suitable for re-establishing the center of the economy that is shaking from its roots.

sentences.src_sentence: 그는 소신이 분명하고 배짱이 두둑한 인물로서, 이전의 경제사령탑이었던 김정렴, 남덕우, 김용환 등과는 여러모로 다른 스타일이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: His style was different in many ways from his former economic leaders, such as Kim Jeong-ryeom, Nam Deok-woo, and Kim Yong-hwan, he was a person with clear convictions and strong guts.

sentences.src_sentence: 신현확은 취임 즉시 물가안정을 최우선으로 삼고, 이를 1979년 새해 업무보고에서 박정희에게 설명했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: When Shin Hyeon-Hak took office, he made price stability a priority and explained this to Park Chung-Hee in his New Year's report in 1979.

sentences.src_sentence: 장밋빛 청사진 제시는 온데간데 없고, 고통과 시련을 감수하는 내용의 시나리오가 보고서의 주된 내용이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The main content of the report was a scenario of enduring pain and trials while the presentation of rosy blueprints was nowhere to be found.

sentences.src_sentence: 구조조정론을 제기해 왔는데, 신현확이 새 경제사령탑에 앉으면서 이를 덜컥 새로운 정책 방향으로 채택한 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: When Shin Hyun-Hak took the new economic command post, he adopted it as a new policy direction ignoring the theory of restructuring which was raised.

sentences.src_sentence: 그는 실무책임자 강경식 기획차관보를 중심으로 이른바 안정화 정책을 개시했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He started the so-called stabilization policy, which was led by Assistant Secretary for Planning Kang Kyung-sik.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희로서는 신임 부총리 신현확의 거침없는 행보에 안심되기는커녕, 지금까지 자신이 이룩해 온 성장기반이 무너져 내리는 데 대한 불안감을 떨칠 수 없었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The reckless move of the new Deputy Prime Minister Shin Hyeon-hwak, did not relieve Park Chung-hee and he could not get rid of the anxiety that the foundation for growth he had built up until now was collapsing.

sentences.src_sentence: 신현확의 주장은 한마디로 수출중심 성장우선 정책을 180도 바꾸겠다는 것이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Shin Hyeon-Hak's argued a 180 degree change to the export-oriented growth-first policy.

sentences.src_sentence: 안정화 정책은 엄청난 고통과 저항을 몰고 왔다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Tremendous pain and resistance was brought about by the stabilization policy.

sentences.src_sentence: 안정화 정책의 핵심과제가 수출금융 축소 및 폐지를 비롯해 중화학공업 투자 축소 및 연기 그리고 새마을 사업으로 추진되어 온 농촌주택개량사업 축소 등이었는데, 이들 모두가 대통령이 직접 주도해 왔던 것들이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The stabilization policy worked to reduce or abolish export finance, the reduction and postponement of investment in the heavy and chemical industry, and the reduction of rural housing improvement projects promoted by the Saemaul project, which were all directly led by the president.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희는 안정화 정책이 마뜩잖았으나 한국은행이나 KDI 등에서도 같은 의견을 내 놓는 바람에 처음 몇 달 동안은 신현확의 제안대로 마지못해 따라갔다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Park Chung-hee's had a stabilization policy, but the Bank of Korea and KDI also expressed the same opinion, so he reluctantly followed Shin's suggestion for the first few months.

sentences.src_sentence: 자신의 정책이 전부 뒤집어지는 판에 마음이 편할 리 없었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It was impossible for him to feel at ease when his policies were all overturned.

sentences.src_sentence: 경제기획원이 중심이 돼서 추진하겠다는 금융 자율화, 수입 자유화 정책 방향에 대해 재무부와 상공부, 농림수산부 등이 합세해서 반대하고 나섰다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The Ministry of Finance, the Ministry of Commerce, and the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries worked together to resist the policy direction of financial liberalization and income liberalization, which the EPB wanted to promote.

sentences.src_sentence: “실정을 모르는 개혁론자의 말대로 하다간 한국경제를 모두 망가뜨린다.”라면서 오히려 수출과 중화학공업투자를 계속해 나가야 한다고 주장했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: “If we do as the reformists who are ignorant of the facts say, we will ruin the entire Korean economy, ” he said, reasoning that exports and investment in the heavy and chemical industry should continue.

sentences.src_sentence: 마음에 들지 않는 안정화 정책을 계속 고집하는 신현확의 청와대 면담 자체를 기피하기도 했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Shin Hyun-Hak, continued to contend on a stabilization policy that he did not like, and even avoided the meeting with the Blue House itself.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희는 전 재무부 장관 김용환을 개인적으로 다시 불러들여 재기용 언질을 주면서 준비를 지시했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: When Park Chung-hee personally invited Kim Yong-hwan, the former Minister of Finance, again and gave him instructions for re-election and instructed the preparations.

sentences.src_sentence: 임시정부 성격의 최규하 정권에서 정치는 심각한 혼돈에 빠져들었지만, 경제는 안정화 정책이 신현확 총리를 중심으로 오히려 날개를 달았다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Under the Choi Gyu-ha regime, a provisional government, politics were chaotic, but the economic stabilization policy focused on Prime Minister Shin Hyun-hwak.

sentences.src_sentence: 기획차관보 강경식은 총리의 절대 신임 속에 평소에 품어 왔던 개혁의지를 정책으로 펼쳐 나갔다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Under the Prime Minister's absolute confidence, Kang Kyung-sik, Assistant Minister for Planning carried out his usual will for reform as a policy. .

sentences.src_sentence: 정보부로서야 당연히 정권 안보 여부가 모든 판단의 기준이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: For the intelligence department, the security of the government was the standard for all judgments.

sentences.src_sentence: 비인기 정책일 수밖에 없는 강력한 긴축 정책을 지지했다는 것은 당시의 경제상황이 정치적으로도 매우 심각했음을 말해 주는 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The support of a strong austerity policy, which was bound to be unpopular policy suggests that the economic situation at the time was also very serious politically.

sentences.src_sentence: 고양이 목에 방울을 단 사람들 박정희 정권 말기에 추진된 경제 안정화 정책은 가히 코페르니쿠스적 전환이라고 할 만큼 획기적이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The economic stabilization policy promoted at the end of the Park Chung-hee regime was so groundbreaking that it could be called a Copernican transition.

sentences.src_sentence: 전환이 다름 아닌 박정희 시대가 키워 온 직업 관료들에 의해 시작·추진되었다는 점은 주목할 만하다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It is important to note that the transformation was started and endorsed by none other than the professional bureaucrats raised during the Park Chung-hee era.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희 경제에 앞장서 왔던 그들이 박정희 정책의 문제점을 지적하고 그에 대한 대안 제시와 새로운 처방을 주장하고 나섰던 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Those who were at the forefront of Park Chung-hee's economy revealed the problems of Park's policy, and suggested alternatives and argued for new prescriptions.

sentences.src_sentence: 1970년 후반에 들어오면서부터 경제기획원의 핵심관료들 사이에는 박정희식 경제 정책에 대한 위기의식이 확산되고 있었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: A sense of crisis about Park Chung-hee's economic policy has been spreading among key officials of the EPB since the late 1970s.

sentences.src_sentence: ‘반란’의 주모자 격이었던 강경식은 당시 상황을 다음과 같이 증언했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Kang Kyung-sik, the mastermind behind the 'rebellion', testified of the situation at the time as follows.

sentences.src_sentence: 1978년 당시 경제 관료들은 어떻게 하면 물가안정을 이루고 국제수지 흑자를 내는 경제를 만들 수 있는가 염원했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: In 1978, economic bureaucrats wanted to achieve price stability and build an economy with a balance of payments surplus.

sentences.src_sentence: 제1차 석유파동 때 우리는 경기부양에 역점을 뒀는데, 일본과 대만은 물가안정에 우선순위를 뒀다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: While Japan and Taiwan prioritized price stability during the first oil crisis, we focused on stimulating the economy.

sentences.src_sentence: 공무원은 물론이고, 경제학자나 연구기관, 심지어는 언론조차 대통령의 심기를 거슬리는 정책 건의나 비판을 대놓고 하기 어려운 때였다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: This was a challenging time for public officers, economists, research institutes, and even the media to make outright policy suggestions or criticisms that offend the president.

sentences.src_sentence: 이런 상황에서 경제기획원은 차관보 강경식, 기획국장 김재익 등을 중심으로 1978년부터 안정화 정책에 시동을 걸기 시작했다.

sentences.src_sentence: 전임 정권이 벌여 놓은 중화학공업 과잉투자의 부실화 문제와 만성 인플레이션 문제를 해결하는 것이 발등의 불이었기 때문이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: This is because it was urgent to solve the problem of insolvency of heavy and chemical overinvestment and chronic inflation of the previous administration had made.

sentences.src_sentence: 더해 전두환 집권의 정당성을 드러내기 위해서는 박정희 정권의 잘못한 점을 부각시킬 필요가 있다고 판단했던 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Additionally, it was decided that it was necessary to highlight the faults of the Park Chung-hee administration to reveal the legitimacy of the Chun Doo-hwan administration.

sentences.src_sentence: 그런 이유로 박정희가 만든 부가가치세를 폐지시키는 방안을 구체적으로 검토한 일도 있었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Therefore, to abolish the value-added tax created by Park Chung-hee a specific review of the plan was created.

sentences.src_sentence: 그러다가 1980년대 중반 들어 경제가 물가안정을 기반으로 ‘3저 호황’을 맞아 크게 좋아지면서부터 비로소 박정희 시대에 대한 재발견 움직임이 일기 시작했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The economy greatly advanced in the 'three low boom' based on price stability, in the mid-1980s there was a movement to rediscover the era of Park Chung-hee.

sentences.src_sentence: 그동안 중화학공업은 박정희 경제가 저지른 과잉투자의 표본처럼 비판받아 왔는데, 중화학공업 제품들이 불과 몇 년 만에 수출의 효자 역할을 하고 있다는 사실을 발견했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Meanwhile, the heavy and chemical industry received criticism as a model of overinvestment committed by the Park Chung-hee economy.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환 시대에서 이룩된 도약의 발판이 박정희 때 만들어졌음을 새삼 인식하게 된 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He acknowledged anew that the building blocks for the leap made in the era of Chun Doo-hwan was made during the time of Chung-hee Park.

sentences.src_sentence: 독재정치에 대한 비난을 뒤로하고, 거꾸로 박정희 시대에 대한 평가가 긍정적으로 바뀌는 현상은 그가 뿌린 내린 경제개발의 씨앗들이 시간을 두고 결실을 맺으면서 시작된 일이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: When the assessment of Park Chung-hee's era turned positive, it left behind the criticism of the dictatorship and the seeds of economic development he planted began to bear fruit over time.

sentences.src_sentence: 경제 민주화 바람 이후 한국경제가 10년간 방황한 것이 리더십 부재에서 비롯되었다고 느꼈던 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It was the general feeling that lack of leadership caused 10 years of wandering of the Korean economy after the economic democratization winds.

sentences.src_sentence: 평생 박정희를 비판했던 김대중의 평가가 어떠했는지도 매우 흥미롭다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Seeing how Kim Dae-jung, who criticized Park Chung-hee all his life, was evaluated was a point of interest.

sentences.src_sentence: 그는 1970년대 초부터 박정희의 수출주도 경제를 격렬하게 비판해 왔다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Since the early 1970s he was a fierce critic of Park Chung-hee's export-led economy.

sentences.src_sentence: 자신의 저서 『대중참여경제론』은 개정판을 통해 박정희의 공로를 대폭 인정하는 쪽으로 고쳤다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: His book 『Public Participatory Economy』 has been revised to greatly acknowledge the contribution of Park Chung-hee.

sentences.src_sentence: “하면 된다는 자신감을 국민에게 심어준 강력한 리더십을 발휘했다.”라고 높이 평가하는 대목도 나온다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He is also praised in a passage, saying, “He showed strong leadership that instilled confidence in the people that it can be done.”.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희 경제를 다시 보기 위한 요령은 집권 18년을 세 구간으로 잘라 보는 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: By cutting the 18 years in power into three sections we can re-examine the economy of Park Chung-hee.

sentences.src_sentence: 시행착오를 거듭했던 군사정권 첫 2년 6개월, 그리고 수출을 앞세운 산업화가 본격적으로 추진되었던 10년 남짓, 마지막으로 중화학공업을 중심으로 한 유신 체제의 경제 정책 등으로 구분해서 살펴볼 수 있다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The initial two years and six months of the military administration, experienced repeated trials and errors, lasting more than 10 years, when industrialization centered on exports was promoted in earnest, and finally, the economic policies of the Yushin system centered on the heavy and chemical industry.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희 경제를 산업화라는 용어만으로 담아내는 것은 부적절하다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Park Chung-hee's economy cannot only be described in terms of industrialization.

sentences.src_sentence: 그는 공장을 짓고 다리만 놓은 것이 아니라, 쌀의 다수확 품종을 개발시켜 주식 자급을 이룩했고, 한국과학기술원이나 대덕연구 단지를 만들어 오늘의 기술입국에 초석을 닦았다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He achieved self-sufficiency in stocks by developing high-yielding varieties of rice, and established the Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology or the Daedeok Research Complex, laying the foundation for today's technology entry and built a factory and bridge.

sentences.src_sentence: 국세청을 통해 세금을 제대로 걷는 제도를 만들었고, 복지 정책으로 의료보험제도를 처음 시작했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He also started the medical insurance system as a welfare policy for the first time, and created a system to properly collect taxes through the National Tax Service.

sentences.src_sentence: 오늘날 한국 정부의 기본 틀이 박정희의 손에 의해 완성되었다 해도 과언이 아닐 정도다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: To say that the basic framework of the Korean government today was completed by Park Chung-hee, is no exaggeration. .

sentences.src_sentence: 그는 군 사령관 출신답게 초장부터 전쟁하듯이 밀어붙였다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: As a former military commander, he strategized from the ground up.

sentences.src_sentence: 판단과 집행이 빨랐고, 수많은 비판과 반대, 부작용에도 아랑곳하지 않고 과감하게 부수고 바꿨다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He boldly broke free and changed without regard for numerous criticisms, objections, and side effects, and his judgments and execution were quick.

sentences.src_sentence: 초기의 박정희는 공장 건설에 몰두한 프로젝트 매니저 같았다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: In the beginning, it seemed like Park Chung-hee was like a project manager who was immersed in factory construction.

sentences.src_sentence: 외국 차관으로 시멘트 공장, 비료 공장, 정유 공장, 제철 공장 등을 서둘러 짓는 일에 전력투구했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: All of his power was devoted to quicken construction of cement factories, fertilizer factories, oil refineries, and steel mills with foreign loans.

sentences.src_sentence: 필요하면 기업 총수들을 수시로 불러 담판을 지었고, 말단 공무원이라도 아이디어만 좋으면 직접 상대했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: If needed, the company leaders were often called to negotiate, and even the lowest level civil servants were dealt with directly if they had good ideas.

sentences.src_sentence: 필요한 공장만 계획대로 지을 수 있다면 웬만한 허물이나 부정을 고발하는 투서가 들어와도 모른척 했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: I pretended not to know even if a letter came in accusing me of any faults or injustice if only the necessary factories could be built according to the plan.

sentences.src_sentence: 판단하는 과정은 신중했지만 일단 결심이 서면 반대를 허용치 않았다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: No objections were allowed once the decision was made; the process of judging was prudent.

sentences.src_sentence: 반대를 물리치는 독단적 정책결정 과정이 많은 논란과 부작용도 불렀다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The arbitrary policy-making process defeating the opposition led to many controversies and side effects.

sentences.src_sentence: 반대를 무릅쓰고 추진한 포항제철이나 경부고속도로 건설처럼 박정희의 용기와 결단에 찬사를 보낼 수밖에 없는 일도 있었는가 하면, 다른 한편으로는 정치적 탄압으로 반대 세력을 부당하게 억압했던 부정적 측면 또한 엄연한 사실이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: There were situations where we were forced to praise Park Chung-hee for his courage and determination, such as the construction of Pohang Steel and Gyeongbu Expressway, which was carried out regardless of opposition, and on the other hand, the negative aspect of unreasonably suppressing opposing forces through political repression was also a fact.

sentences.src_sentence: 40년 인플레를 잡다, 전두환 시대 경제 대통령 전두환은 역대 대통령 호감도 조사를 보면 어느 경우에나 꼴찌에 속한다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: 40 Years of Inflation, Economy President of the Chun Doo-hwan Era Chun Doo-hwan is last on the list of previous presidential favorability surveys.

sentences.src_sentence: 5·18광주민주화운동의 유혈진압이나 재임 중의 축재, 친인척 비리 스캔들로 이미지가 결코 좋을 수 없다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Due to the bloody suppression of the May 18 Gwangju Democratization Movement, the wealth of money during his tenure, and the corruption scandal of relatives the image can never be good.

sentences.src_sentence: 그런 과오에도 불구하고 그의 경제 치적은 결코 과소평가될 수 없다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Regardless of his errors, his economic success can never be underrated.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희 시대가 한국의 경제발전 기틀을 마련한 것은 사실이나, 앞에서 살펴본 것처럼 정권 말기의 부작용과 어려움은 매우 심각했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: While the Park Chung-hee era created the foundation for Korea's economic advancement, but the side effects and difficulties at the end of the regime were very serious.

sentences.src_sentence: 무력으로 정권을 잡은 전두환은 박정희 경제의 막판 위기 상황을 어렵사리 극복해 냈고, 한국경제를 여러 면에서 한 단계 끌어올렸다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Chun Doo-hwan, raised the Korean economy to the next level in many ways, took power by force, overcame the last-minute crisis of Park Chung-hee's economy.

sentences.src_sentence: 건국 이후 계속 되던 만성 인플레이션을 근절시켰을 뿐 아니라 고도성장 시대를 부활시켰고, 여기에 더해 감히 엄두도 내지 못했던 국제수지 흑자 시대를 열었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: As well as erasing chronic inflation that had continued since the founding of the country, they also revived the era of high growth, and opened an era of balance-of-payments surplus that could not even be dared.

sentences.src_sentence: 처음으로 물가안정, 경제성장, 국제수지흑자라는 소위 세 마리 토끼를 한꺼번에 잡은 대통령이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He was the first president to catch the so-called three rabbits at once: price stability, economic growth, and international balance of payments surplus.

sentences.src_sentence: 경제성장도 잘하고, 물가도 안정시키고, 국제수지도 흑자를 만들어 낸다는 것은 전문가들 사이에서도 불가능한 것으로 여겨 왔었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Even experts were of the opinion that economic growth, stabilizing prices, and creating a balance of payments surplus were impossible.

sentences.src_sentence: 아무도 전두환 정권이 ‘세 마리 토끼’를 잡아낼 것으로 기대한 사람은 없었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It was unexpected of the Chun Doo-hwan regime to catch the 'three rabbits'.

sentences.src_sentence: 세 마리 토끼가 무얼 뜻하는지도 몰랐던 인물이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He wasn’t even aware of the meaning of the three rabbits.

sentences.src_sentence: 그는 집권 초기부터 철권통치로 비판과 저항을 봉쇄한 가운데 물가안정 정책에 총력을 기울였고, 유능한 전문 인력을 기용했으며, 본인 스스로 열심히 경제공부를 해 나갔다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He focused on price stabilization policies while blocking criticism and resistance with an iron fist, and hired talented professionals, and he studied economics diligently on his own from the beginning of his administration.

sentences.src_sentence: 경제를 운용하는 기본 틀은 전임자 박정희를 그대로 따라했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: His predecessor, Park Chung-hee provided the basic framework for running the economy.

sentences.src_sentence: 정치적 억압 면에서는 오히려 유신 시대의 박정희를 능가했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He surpassed Park Chung-hee during the Yushin period in terms of political repression.

sentences.src_sentence: 언론을 장악한 가운데 경제 관료들을 중심으로 강력한 경제 우선 정책을 펴는 바람에, 법이나 제도를 만드는 국회의원들은 박정희 시대에 이어서 별다른 영향력을 행사할 수 없었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Lawmakers who made laws and institutions could not exercise much influence following the Park Chung-hee era, while economic bureaucrats carried out a strong economy-first policy while controlling the media.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환은 역대 대통령 중에서 가장 운이 좋은 대통령이기도 했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The luckiest president of all time was Chun Doo-hwan.

sentences.src_sentence: 재임 중반에 국제 원윳값이 떨어진 것을 비롯해 국제금리와 달러 값이 동반 하락하는 소위 ‘3저 호황’이 전두환 경제를 결정적으로 도왔다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Chun Doo-hwan's economy was certainly assisted by the so-called 'three-low boom', where global interest rates and the dollar fell together, including the fall in the international won in the middle of his tenure.

sentences.src_sentence: 대외 여건 덕을 봤다고 해서 그의 치적을 과소평가할 순 없다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: His achievements cannot be underestimated just because he has benefited from external circumstances.

sentences.src_sentence: 3저 호황은 세계 모든 나라가 겪었지만 유독 한국경제가 3저 현상을 잘 활용해서 좋은 성과를 만들어 냈기 때문이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Although all the countries in the world experienced the three-low boom, it is because the Korean economy made good use of the three-low phenomenon and produced good results.

sentences.src_sentence: 물가안정은 원윳값 하락에 도움을 받기도 했지만, 이전부터 전두환 정권이 추진했던 강력한 긴축 정책 등 지독한 노력이 있었기에 가능했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The decline in the won price aided the inflation stabilization but it was only possible thanks to intense efforts such as the strong austerity policy promoted by the Chun Doo-hwan administration.

sentences.src_sentence: 개방 정책이나 투자확대 정책 등을 미리미리 준비했었기 때문에 타이밍을 잃지 않고 대외여건 호전의 상승 물결에 올라탈 수 있었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: We were able to ride on the rising wave of improvement in external conditions without losing the timing because we had prepared in advance the policy of opening up and expanding investment.

sentences.src_sentence: 예산동결 같은 파격적인 조치는 일종의 정치적 자살행위나 마찬가지였다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Extreme measures like a budget freeze were a type of political suicide.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환은 정부 스스로 허리띠를 졸라매는 결단을 내림으로써 재정안정화의 기틀을 마련했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: By making the decision to tighten the belt on its own Chun Doo-hwan laid the foundation for financial stabilization.

sentences.src_sentence: 지금까지도 한국의 재정 상태가 다른 나라에 비해 양호한 것은 당시의 재정혁신 덕택이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Thanks to the fiscal innovation at the time, Korea's financial condition is still better than that of other countries is.

sentences.src_sentence: 산업 쪽에서는 전임 정권에서 넘어온 중화학공업 과잉투자와 부실 문제를 해결했고, 전자교환기 도입 등을 시작으로 오늘의 통신 혁명 인프라를 구축했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: On the industrial side, transferred from the previous administration, the problem of overinvestment and insolvency in the heavy and chemical industry was resolved, and today's telecommunication revolutionary infrastructure was built, starting with the introduction of electronic exchangers.

sentences.src_sentence: 오늘날 인터넷 강국이 될 수 있었던 기본 터전이 이때 마련되었던 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: It was at this time that the basic ground that would become today's Internet powerhouse was laid.

sentences.src_sentence: 재벌의 경제력 집중 문제에 대처하기 위한 공정거래제도도 정권 초기에 도입되었는데, 기업들이 반대할 겨를도 없이 신군부가 후다닥 결정했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: To deal with the problem of concentration of economic power by the companies, the fair trade system was also introduced in the early days of the regime, but the new military made a decision afterward, with no time for corporations to oppose it.

sentences.src_sentence: 박정희 시대의 연장선에서라면 엄두를 낼 수 없는 일들이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: These were things that could not be afforded In the extension of the Park Chung-hee era.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환 시대의 한국경제는 여러 방면에서 도약적인 발전을 기록했고, 전두환은 스스로 경제대통령임을 자임했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: In the era of Chun Doo-hwan, the Korean economy recorded a leap forward in development, and Chun Doo-hwan self-appointed as economic president.

sentences.src_sentence: 이 같은 성과에도 불구하고 최대의 실패라는 비판을 면키 어려운 것이 노동 정책이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The labor policy that was hard to avoid being criticized as the biggest failure, despite other achievements.

sentences.src_sentence: 그는 집권 이후 줄곧 노동조합에 대한 탄압을 강화했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He intensified the oppression of trade unions since taking office.

sentences.tgt_sentence: He was stuck in his original obsession, which regarded the activation of trade unions as a factor in social unrest.

sentences.src_sentence: 최악의 경제와 정치적 혼란 전두환 시대의 경제 정책을 올바로 이해하기 위해서는 첫 출발 때의 정치·경제 상황을 되짚어 봐야 한다.

sentences.tgt_sentence: In fact, even in rice farming, there was a great famine due to pests and diseases, and the public sentiment was extremely atrocious.

sentences.tgt_sentence: At the same time, political turmoil, economic crisis, and social unrest struck.

sentences.tgt_sentence: Economic policy was for a time freed from political interference and passed into the hands of economic bureaucrats while political turmoil reached its peak in the vacuum of power.

sentences.tgt_sentence: After the president passed away, economic bureaucrats who wanted to cut back on export assistance and investments in the heavy and chemical industries, tighten their belts, and concentrate on price stability but couldn't afford to pay attention to the president, started to pursue the intended stabilization policy seriously.

sentences.tgt_sentence: Only after Park Chung-hee passed away was it possible to change his regulations.

sentences.tgt_sentence: He was confident that the fight against persistent inflation would help him win the people's support by swiftly addressing Park Chung-hee's economy's negative effects.

sentences.src_sentence: 물가가 안정돼야 국민의 생활도 나아지고 수출경쟁력도 회복되어 다시 경제가 활력을 찾게 된다는 과외 선생님의 가르침을 충실히 이행해 나갔다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: I faithfully adhered to the tutor's advice that the economy will only recover its vitality and the people's standard of living when prices are stabilized.

sentences.tgt_sentence: Economics, you are the president. There probably isn’t a president who vigorously and systematically studied the economy like Chun Doo-hwan.

sentences.src_sentence: 보안사령부라는 곳이 중앙정보부 못지않은 막강한 군 정보기관이었으므로 전두환은 정치나 경제동향에 대한 안목을 길러야 할 필요성을 느꼈다.

sentences.src_sentence: 당시로써는 박정희의 죽음을 예상했을 리 없었고, 더구나 자신이 대통령이 될 것이라는 생각은 꿈에도 했을 리 만무한데, 묘하게도 보안사령관 시절에 경제공부를 시작했던 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Strangely, he began studying economics while he was the security commander, despite the fact that he could not have foreseen Park Chung-passing hee's at the time, and that it was also impossible to imagine that he would one day hold the office of president.

sentences.src_sentence: 경제 선생 박봉환과 김재익을 만난 것은 전두환에게 행운이었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Chun Doo-hwan had the good fortune to meet economics instructors Jae-ik Kim and Bong-hwan Park.

sentences.src_sentence: 첫 번째 가정교사 박봉환은 박정희 시대의 성장일변도 정책에 비판적이었으며 철저한 안정론자였다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The first tutor, Park Bong-hwan, was a staunch stabilityist who opposed the Park Chung-hee era's growth-oriented policy.

sentences.tgt_sentence: In the office of security commander Chun Doo-hwan, Park Bong-han frequently gave lessons on the realities of the Korean economy and laid out in plain terms how crucial price stability is.

sentences.src_sentence: “국민을 못 살게 하는 측면에서는 히틀러보다 더 나쁜 놈이 인플레이션”이라고 가르쳤다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He asserted that when it comes to incapacitating the populace, inflation is worse than Hitler.

sentences.tgt_sentence: He boasted about his education and even invited his subordinates to a lecture.

sentences.src_sentence: 그랬던 그가 정권을 잡았으므로 경제 정책의 기본 방향은 이미 서 있는 것이나 마찬가지였다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The fundamental course of economic policy was already set when he came to power.

sentences.src_sentence: 결정적인 것은 두 번째 가정교사인 김재익을 만난 것이다.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환은 1979년 12·12사태로 정권을 잡고 여러 경제전문가들을 불러 테스트 삼아 경제공부를 해 본 다음, 전임 선생보다 더 철저한 안정론자 김재익을 선택한 것이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Following the December 12 incident in 1979, Chun Doo-hwan assumed power and invited several economists to study economics for a test.

sentences.tgt_sentence: Kim Jae-ik, who has a strong propensity for reform, was chosen by Nam Deok-woo at the end of the Park Chung-hee administration and served as the Economic Planning Board's planning director, but he was facing significant challenges.

sentences.src_sentence: 딜레마에 빠진 한국경제를 구출하기 위해서는 안정화 정책을 비롯한 과감한 개혁조치를 해야 한다는 소신과 여러 아이디어가 직업 관료들의 집단 따돌림 속에 아무 힘을 쓰지 못했기 때문이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: This is due to the fact that, in the face of intimidation by seasoned bureaucrats, the beliefs and ideas that drastic reform measures, including stabilization policies, must be taken to rescue the Korean economy from the predicament, lacked force.

sentences.tgt_sentence: Kim Jae-ik laid out his reform concepts as if he were sketching a picture on a piece of paper.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환은 경제에 문외한이었으나 학습 소화 능력이 뛰어났고, 김재익은 아무리 복잡한 경제문제도 쉽게 풀어서 설명·설득하는 기술이 탁월했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: While Kim Jae-ik was adept at explaining and persuading even complex economic issues with ease, Chun Doo-hwan was illiterate in the economics field but was very good at learning and taking in information.

sentences.src_sentence: 세 마리 토끼라고 하는 성장·물가·국제수지가 무엇을 의미하는 것인지, 상호 어떤 관계에 있는지를 명쾌하게 깨우쳐 줬다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: He made it very clear to me what the three rabbits stand for: growth, price, and balance of payments, as well as how they relate to one another.

sentences.src_sentence: 물가안정이 왜 최우선과제가 되어야 하는지, 시간이 걸리고 어렵더라도 금융 자율화와 개방 정책이 어떻게 한국경제에 도움이 되는지를 전두환의 머릿속에 깊이 입력시켰다.

sentences.tgt_sentence: Chun Doo-hwan had a good understanding of his lessons and had almost memorized them all.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환은 대통령에 취임하면서 그를 첫 경제수석에 기용했고 그가 코치하는 대로 경제운영의 기본을 구상했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Upon taking office as president, Chun Doo-hwan named him the first chief economic officer and developed the fundamentals of economic management while coaching.

sentences.src_sentence: 김재익의 개혁 정책을 견제하려는 군부의 움직임에도 불구하고 전두환은 “경제는 당신이 대통령이야.”라며 그를 절대적으로 신임했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Chun Doo-hwan had complete faith in Kim Jae-ik despite the military's attempt to check his reform agenda, telling him, "In the economy, you are the president".

sentences.tgt_sentence: A ruler who maintained price stability Chun Doo-hwan has succeeded in ending inflation, a persistent problem in the Korean economy.

sentences.src_sentence: 결코 쉽지 않은 일이었고, 그런 목표가 달성되리라 예상했던 사람들은 거의 없었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Few people expected it to be accomplished because it was never a simple task.

sentences.src_sentence: 독재자가 인플레이션을 일으킨 경우는 많아도 인플레이션을 잡은 경우는 역사적으로도 드물다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Although dictators frequently bring about inflation, it has historically been uncommon.

sentences.tgt_sentence: As the Chun Doo-hwan period came to an end, the stability policy—which had initially been implemented under the Park Chung-hee era but had not adequately advanced—was actively advocated.

sentences.src_sentence: 원래 국민이 가장 꺼리는 경제 정책이 인플레이션을 잡기 위한 긴축 정책이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The people are most opposed to the austerity measures taken to combat inflation.

sentences.src_sentence: 결과적으로 물가가 안정되는 것은 좋지만, 인플레이션을 잡기 위해 돈줄을 조이거나 임금을 억제하는 정책은 매우 고통스럽기 때문이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Therefore, it is advantageous that prices are stable, but policies that tighten credit conditions or reduce wages in order to prevent inflation are very painful.

sentences.tgt_sentence: In the face of severe oppression, the union was forced to follow government policy.

sentences.tgt_sentence: The entire country was required to pay close attention to economic education about how to break the cycle of rising prices and wages.

sentences.src_sentence: 1980년의 도매물가 상승률은 제2차 석유파동까지 겹쳐 무려 42.3%나 됐다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Due to the second oil shock in 1980, wholesale price growth accelerated to a staggering 42.3%.

sentences.src_sentence: 이런 물가상승률을 한 자리 숫자로 낮추겠다는 것이 김재익 청와대 경제수석이 주도한 전두환 정권의 목표였다.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환 정권 말기의 한국경제는 그야말로 단군 이래 최대의 호황을 구가했던 셈이다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The Korean economy experienced its biggest expansion since Dangun at the end of the Chun Doo-hwan administration.

sentences.src_sentence: 물가야 원래 안정됐던 것이고, 수출 호조로 국제수지 문제와 성장 문제가 한꺼번에 풀렸으니 한국경제의 모든 골칫거리가 죄다 해결됐다 해도 과언이 아니었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Saying that all of the Korean economy's problems have been solved would not be an exaggeration given that prices were initially stable and that both the balance of payments and the growth issues were instantly resolved as a result of the fast export growth.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환은 정권을 내려놓는 순간까지도 “죽어가던 한국경제를 내가 살렸다.”라는 확신에 차 있었다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: The conviction that "I salvaged the dying Korean economy" filled Chun Doo-hwan.

sentences.src_sentence: 전두환은 다음 정권에서 제아무리 세상이 바뀐다 해도, 자신이 구축해 내놓은 경제 정책들은 그대로 계승될 것으로 믿어 의심치 않았다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: No matter how much the world changed during the upcoming administration, Chun Doo-hwan was confident that the economic policies he had developed would be carried over.

sentences.src_sentence: 친구에게 정권을 넘겨줬으니 당연히 그럴 것으로 기대했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Naturally, he anticipated that since he gave a friend control of the government.

sentences.src_sentence: 정권이 바뀌었지만 재무부 장관을 비롯해 몇몇 주요 부처 장관들이 그대로 유임된 것이 그러한 증거였다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: This was demonstrated by the fact that although the government changed, some important ministers, such as the minister of finance, remained in place.

sentences.src_sentence: 수입개방이 본격화되다 한국경제 수십 년 동안 수출은 선이요, 수입은 악으로 통했다.
sentences.tgt_sentence: Fully operational import season For many years, the Korean economy has viewed imports as bad and exports as good.
